Human Activity Recognition Using Smartphones
"Data.csv"

Test.Sample
        The sample number for the participants of the test set
                1 - 30 .Every participant has their own assigned number

Test.Mean  
        The mean for every observation of the participant  

Test.Standard.Deviation  
        The standard deviation for every observation of the participant  
        
Test.Activity  
        The activity that the participant is doing during the observation
        Walking
        Walking Upstairs
        Walking Downstairs
        Sitting
        Standing
        Laying
